page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF APRIL
page.content: {April Macleod, age 11. My Mum usually wakens me about 8.15 and I get up shortly after that.After breakfast I get washed and dressed. A few minutes walk gets me to school for 9.30,after which we do some work until the first break at 10.45. After that we do more work until lunchtime at 12.30. Unlike all the other children I go home for lunch. In the afternoon we usually do project work until 3.30 when school finishes. I then walk home and change my clothes then usually I go down to the shop. After that I usually watch T.V.till 5 o'clock when we have dinner. I do the dishes next, then take the dog for a walk down the croft. Sometimes I go out to play in the evenings or play cards with Mum and Dad. Then I watch T.V. after which I get ready for bed. Once in bed I read before I go off to sleep.
